Hi everyone,

I’m building a theme that has a non-conventional functionality, and I would appreciate any input on the approach.
I want to build a ‘Support hub’ or an ‘Advanced FAQ section’ similar to this one: <https://rivian.com/support>

My solutions so far are:
1. Use HubDB to insert all the FAQ single pages, and create dynamic pages for every question
2. Create a blog and each FAQ to be its own ‘blog post’
Option 1: Seems more flexible, since I can create breadcrumbs and nest everything how I want, but I am afraid it might get a bit complicated (UX wise for the client) to maintain all the content in HubDB

Option 2: I can filter everything with categories/tags but I am not sure if then I can create another ‘Blog’ to be used as an actual blog and not have tags to be mixed between the two.
